meanings.definition: A person who is dishonest or untrustworthy.
meanings.sent1: That nogoodnik tried to cheat me out of my money.
meanings.sent2: Don't trust that nogoodnik with your secrets.
meanings.sent3: The nogoodnik pretended to be a friend but was really a trickster.
meanings.sent4: Beware of the nogoodnik in sheep's clothing.
meanings.sent5: The town was full of nogoodniks looking to take advantage of others.

meanings.definition: Something that is of poor quality or not functioning properly.
meanings.sent1: I bought a cheap watch, but it turned out to be a nogoodnik.
meanings.sent2: The old car was a nogoodnik and broke down on the highway.
meanings.sent3: The nogoodnik toaster burned every slice of bread it touched.
meanings.sent4: The leaky roof was a real nogoodnik during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The nogoodnik computer crashed right before the important presentation.
